Tonight, I have a special story just for you.

Once upon a time, in a small village nestled between the rivers, there was a beautiful land called Darfur. In the heart of Darfur, there was a magical forest, filled with towering acacia trees, colorful flowers, and sparkling streams.

In this enchanted forest, there lived a kind and gentle queen named Najma. She had long, dark hair as black as the night sky and eyes shining like the brightest stars. Queen Najma ruled over the forest with wisdom and compassion, and her people loved her dearly.

One day, a small, brave and curious boy named Karim ventured into the forest. He had heard tales of the magical creatures that lived within its borders and wanted to see them for himself. As he wandered deeper into the forest, he stumbled upon a hidden clearing, where a majestic elephant was waiting for him.

The elephant spoke to Karim in a gentle voice, saying, "Welcome, young one! I am Maha, the guardian of the forest. Queen Najma has sent me to take you on a special journey."

Maha led Karim on a thrilling adventure, showing him the wonders of the forest. They chased after butterflies with iridescent wings, watched the sun set behind the mountains, and even discovered a hidden waterfall that sang a sweet melody.

As the stars began to twinkle in the night sky, Maha led Karim to the palace of Queen Najma. The queen welcomed Karim with open arms, and they shared a feast of delicious dates, honey, and sesame seeds.

As the night wore on, Queen Najma told Karim stories of the ancient times, when the land was filled with magic and wonder. She told him of the brave warriors who protected the land from harm and the mighty kingdoms that once stood tall.

Just as Karim was about to leave, Queen Najma gifted him a small, intricately carved wooden box. "For you, little one," she said, "to remind you of the magic that lies within you and the wonders that await you in the world."

From that day on, Karim carried the box with him wherever he went, and the magic of the forest stayed with him, guiding him on his own adventures.

As the moon rises high in the sky, I want you to remember the story of Karim and Queen Najma. Always remember that you too have your own special magic within you, and the world is full of wonder and surprises waiting to be discovered.

As you drift off to sleep, I want you to imagine yourself in the magical forest, surrounded by the beauty and wonder of Darfur. May your dreams be filled with the songs of the waterfall and the stars twinkling like diamonds in the sky.

As-salamu alaykum, little one. May Allah bless you and keep you safe. ðŸ’«
